mdRecord.dcterms:title: A Manual for Regional Defense Councils, c. 1941
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 1941 VA Defense Council manual which discusses the creation of defense councils, the reasons for creation regional defense councils, the appointment and organization of these councils, finances, staff, etc.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
